attributes.action: Designate St Georges Day as a national holiday in England, and have a day accross Britain to celebrate the Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most other countries in the world have them, why not us?  Are we afraid to celebrate who we are and what we have achieved? What is the point of having a saints day if it is not properly celebrated?  We make more of an effort to celebrate the saint of Ireland rather than our own! 
  
Why not have a day to celebrate something that is truely unique in the world, The United Kingdom of Great Britain, four countries united as one.
We should be proud of our country and our heritage, give the country the opportunity to show the rest of the world how proud we are.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
